metadata.Title: CVE-2024-0224 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: Use after free in WebAudio in Google Chrome prior to 120.0.6099.199 alloweda remote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTMLpage. (Chromium security severity: High)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
